articles.title: Research explores cell receptors for bat viruses to understand emergence of zoonotic diseases - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: New research shows that the closest bat virus relatives of the human Middle-East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) coronavirus efficiently bind to bat ACE2 receptors as an entry point into these cells.
